alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:56AM CDT until August 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR SUMNER COUNTY... At 556 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Belle Plaine to near South Haven, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Mulvane, Belle Plaine, Caldwell, Oxford, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Mayfield, Hunnewell, Riverdale, Perth and Wellington Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
